title: (x) The City Garden Show 07 fat face - Carousel {Stephen}
content:
Hello,  
hoping some one can help, what’s the name of the font in the file attached. I can’t for the life of me remember what it is.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706165444/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_89.png) | 23.27 KB |

 [‹ Ice Cream - Round type](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706165444/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37330 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Restaurant & Bar elegant script - Bickham Script {Paul H} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706165444/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37328 "Go to next forum topic")
author: barkeep

comments.content: Looks like Didoni but there are some differences... does Didoni have alternate characters?

As usual fast response, and Carousel it was, thanks Stephen.  
Cheers  
Martin
